headline: 1997 - Rabies post-exposure treatment
main_text: Updated WHO recommendations on rabies post-exposure treatment and the correct technique of intradermal immunization against rabies have been issued. The document (WHO/EMC/ZOO.96.6) can be requested from Dr F.X. Meslin, Division of Emerging and other Communicable Diseases Surveillance and Control, WHO, CH-1211 Geneva 27, Switzerland, fax: 41-22 791 4893 or email: meslinf@who.ch
